actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the killing of three priests and four nuns at the Musami mission in Rhodesia was an unwarranted and atrocious act of violence.

summary.text: Expresses Congressional condemnation of the killing of three priests and four nuns at the Musami mission in Rhodesia.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the killing of three priests and four nuns at the Musami mission in Rhodesia was an unwarranted and atrocious act of violence.
